forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy this morning, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming foggy and damp after midnight. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low near 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low near 50F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 56F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 8C. N winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 46F. N winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 16C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 60F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 9C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 48F. N winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to less than 5 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
